name: Middlemarch Museum
openingHours:
Fridays and Sundays. 
October until late January: 12.00 to 1.00 pm.
January 23 until April 30: 12.00 to 3.00 pm.
Or by request all year by contacting:
Dawn Ramsay 03 464 3835, Merv Wilson 03 464 3473, or Dawn Coburn 03 464 3696. Numbers also on museum door.

offers.description:
Adult $2. Children free.

A minimum of $5 to open museum specially.
